tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Returns_and_Exchanges (
  return_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  return_date DATE,
  exchange_date DATE,
  return_reason VARCHAR(255),
  exchange_reason VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE returns (
  return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  return_date DATE,
  item_id INT,
  return_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE exchanges (
  exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  exchange_date DATE,
  current_item_id INT,
  new_item_id INT,
  exchange_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Returns (
    return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    return_date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    return_reason VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Exchanges (
    exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    exchange_date DATE,
    original_product_id INT,
    new_product_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE SaleRecords (
  sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  sale_date DATE,
  product_id INT,
  quantity_sold INT,
  total_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
